src_original: prajñāpāramitām abhinirharataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ. āha:  kathaṃ bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā?
tgt_original: 云何生般若波羅蜜？ 云何修般若波羅蜜？

src_original: rūpaśāntatayā rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchakatayā rūpāsārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
tgt_original: 色是寂滅故、色是虛誑故、色不實故，應行應生應修般若波羅蜜；

src_original: asārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. yat punar subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
